page.title: 12EVENTS IN THE NEWS
page.content: {VANDAL HAVOC <late June 1985> Young teenagers have caused havoc on the Â£600,000 Paston Ridings new travellers and gypsies site.These young vandals have: Stolen Fire extinguishers and thrown them into a ditch, Taken apart fire alarm bells, Ripped up trees and landscaping work, Smashed a concrete fence panel. The site was newly opened last month. There are 50 caravan/car stands, in between which are small brick-built houses with all the usual amenities. Most travellers and gypsies who are on the site came there because of the new power of the council which allows them to move caravans parked where they shouldn't be.
